Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Mishaps and Debts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on King Guz and related characters, featuring humorous situations involving debts, dinosaur troubles, and romantic misadventures.

sub_scenes.title: The Rescue and the Debt
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is rescued, but immediately confronted about a debt, leading to a humorous and slightly absurd situation.

narrative_arcs.title: King Guz's 'Rescue' and the Unpaid Debt

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Dinosaur Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: Dinny's old age and clumsiness become apparent, leading to discussions about his future and potential trade.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Dealership and Unfortunate Test Drive
narrative_arcs.description: Alley and the caveman visit a dinosaur dealership, leading to a test drive that goes hilariously wrong.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinny's Fate and Alley's Reflection
narrative_arcs.description: The narrative resolves the Dinny situation, showing Alley's emotional farewell and Dinny's ultimate fate at the dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinny, Marked Down at the Dealership
Another Dinosaur Purchase Attempt and Dinny's Return
narrative_arcs.description: A new attempt to purchase a dinosaur goes awry, and Dinny unexpectedly reappears, recognized by his voice.

narrative_arcs.title: Unsuccessful Dinosaur Purchase and Test Drive
Dinny's Mistreatment and Rescue
narrative_arcs.description: Dinny faces mistreatment, but is comforted and promised rescue, leading to anticipation and return.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Strategies
sub_scenes.description: This major arc explores various humorous romantic interactions and misunderstandings, featuring fishing invitations, jealousy, and attempts at learning 'romance'.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A fishing trip is planned, an invitation extended and then rejected, leading to conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning a Fishing Trip and Invitation

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Frustrations and Annoyances
sub_scenes.description: Humorous vignettes about frustrations and annoyances related to fishing and women.

sub_scenes.title: Oola and Romantic Rivalry
sub_scenes.description: A romantic rivalry involving Oola is teased, leading to doubt, encouragement, and confident departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Doubt and Encouragement Regarding Oola's Affection

sub_scenes.title: Cherie and Romantic Compliments
sub_scenes.description: A brief scene of romantic compliments contrasts with complaints and awkwardness.

narrative_arcs.title: Complaints, Awkward Noise, and Romantic Compliments

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy, Misunderstanding, and Comfort
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy leads to a fight, followed by a reveal of misunderstanding and comforting.

sub_scenes.title: Learning Romance Strategy
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss and attempt to learn 'romance' as a strategy, with humorous misunderstandings.

narrative_arcs.title: Practical Romantic Strategy and Hesitant Agreement

sub_scenes.title: Failed Romantic Gestures
sub_scenes.description: Humorous and disastrous attempts at romantic gestures using flowers and logs.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Confrontation and Misunderstood Kiss
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy resurfaces leading to confrontation and a humorous misunderstanding about a romantic kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Misunderstood Cannibal Attack and Romantic Kiss Revelation

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity, Chase, and Fishing Frustrations
sub_scenes.description: Multiple scenes of infidelity accusations, a chase, humorous romantic advances, and general male frustration with women, returning to the fishing theme.

narrative_arcs.title: Infidelity Accusation, Chase, and Romantic Reassurance
Male Frustration with Women While Fishing

sub_scenes.title: The 'New Twist' Dance Craze
sub_scenes.description: This major arc centers around the humorous and dangerous 'New Twist' dance craze and its consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Dangers of the 'Twist'
sub_scenes.description: The 'New Twist' dance is introduced along with its perilous nature and initial attempts to try it.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction and Perils of the 'New Twist' Dance

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lesson and Humiliating Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: A caveman seeks dance lessons for 'the twitch', resulting in a painful and ultimately humiliating experience.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Dance Lesson at Arthur Mugwump Studios

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Overwhelmed by Dance Injuries
sub_scenes.description: The widespread consequences of the 'Twitch' dance are revealed as a hospital is overwhelmed with injuries.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel to Spain for Research
sub_scenes.description: This major arc follows a research problem about 16th-century Spain, leading to a time travel experiment to gather firsthand information.

sub_scenes.title: The 16th Century Spain Research Problem
sub_scenes.description: Researchers discuss the lack of historical records for 16th-century Spain.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Executing Time Travel
sub_scenes.description: The researchers decide to use a time machine to send someone to ancient Spain to gather information.

sub_scenes.title: Time-Traveling Kiss and Return to Lab
sub_scenes.description: A kiss in ancient Spain triggers time travel back to the lab, leading to explanations and a quick return.

narrative_arcs.title: The Time-Traveling Kiss in Ancient Time

sub_scenes.title: Unwanted Serenade and Spanish Manners
sub_scenes.description: In Spain, Alley and Oola encounter a serenade gone wrong, leading to misunderstandings and a 'manners lesson'.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Unwanted Serenade
Arrival of Don Jose and Looming Manager

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight and Unconventional Toreador
sub_scenes.description: A bullfight is delayed, and an unconventional volunteer toreador steps in, leading to a surprising victory.

narrative_arcs.title: Volunteer Toreador and Unconventional Fighting Style
Unlikely Toreador Accepted and Arena Setup

sub_scenes.title: Return Mission and Kiss Denial
sub_scenes.description: The mission in Spain concludes, 'Oop' returns with a promised kiss, but infidelity accusations lead to its denial.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mission and the Kiss Promise

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day and Guz's Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This major arc explores the humorous concept of 'King for a Day' and Guz's comical experience filling in for King Guz.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of King for a Day
sub_scenes.description: The concept of 'King for a Day' is introduced with the celebration of King Ouz.

narrative_arcs.title: Dispute Over the King's Job Difficulty
The Challenge and Offer of Replacement

sub_scenes.title: Temporary King's Unpopular Reign
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king's reign starts with a proclamation but quickly descends into chaos and disrespect.

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Misunderstanding of King's Life
sub_scenes.description: Guz mistakes ulcer pills for bon-bons and experiences the less glamorous side of 'King' life through his wife's scolding.

sub_scenes.title: King's Justice and Wise Man's Plight
sub_scenes.description: This major arc depicts humorous situations around the King's justice and the Wise Man's increasingly difficult role.

sub_scenes.title: Clam Dispute and Wise Solution
sub_scenes.description: A clam dispute is brought before the King, and the Wise Man offers a surprising and humorous solution.

narrative_arcs.title: The Clam Dispute and Wise Man's Solution

sub_scenes.title: Commotion, Money Dispute, and King's Outburst
sub_scenes.description: The King investigates a commotion, gets into a money dispute with the Wise Man, and then has a sudden outburst during dinner.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Commotion and Wise Man's Observation
The King's Feast and Sudden Outburst

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Accusation and Wise Man's Regret
sub_scenes.description: The King's accusations about an ulcer lead to a forced diet for the Wise Man, who expresses regret about his job.

sub_scenes.title: Job Regret, New Offers, and Strange Measures
sub_scenes.description: This major arc presents scenes of job regret, new leadership offers, and peculiar measurement activities.

sub_scenes.title: Hunt Failure and Job Regret
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen apologize for a failed hunt and express regret about a job, possibly related to the King.

narrative_arcs.title: Apologies for Failed Hunt and Job Regret

sub_scenes.title: Shaving and Prophecy at the Tonsorial Parlor
sub_scenes.description: This major arc is centered around a prophecy and a forced shaving scenario at a 'Tonsorial Parlor'.

sub_scenes.title: Prophecy and Shaving Preparation
sub_scenes.description: A romantic prophecy leads to the setup for a forced shave.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This major arc focuses on a time machine experiment and its surprising, chaotic outcome.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Activation
sub_scenes.description: A man sets up a time machine experiment to bring someone from the past.
